sub-events.comment: In case we need to impede the Player's movement via NPC.
If the MOB is moving we set the direction to the movement angle.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
If the MOB isn't running, then he's walking.
If the MOB isn't walking, then he's running.
Consumable Item
Key Item
Rune Item
Targeting and Attack handlers.
If our Party Member is too far away from the Player, let's have our Party Member regroup.
Following code
When not following, face the player
If the Party Member is currently moving but he is close enough to the Player, cease movement
Revive player if in possession of First Aid Kits
If the MOB is moving we set the direction to the movement angle.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
If the MOB isn't running, then he's walking.
If the MOB isn't walking, then he's running.
If an enemy gets too close, retreat!
Otherwise the MOB just stands idle.
When not following, face the target
When ranged combatants search for targets, they do so by lining themselves up with the closest coordinate. After lining up within 8 pixels of the coordinate they face their target and attack.
When Target is out of range or "dead", reset MOB's state to "idle".
If another enemy is encountered, reset target.
Always be trying to find Target.
If the MOB is moving we set the direction to the movement angle.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
If the MOB isn't running, then he's walking.
If the MOB isn't walking, then he's running.
Otherwise the MOB just stands idle.
When Target is out of range or "dead", reset MOB's state to "idle".
If the MOB is moving we set the direction to the movement angle.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
If the MOB isn't running, then he's walking.
If the MOB isn't walking, then he's running.
Otherwise the MOB just stands idle.
When we go back to idle, clear the target.
At semi-random intervals MOB wanders around in search of Targets.
If another MOB is within range, and Faction Alliance = -1, set MOB's target and MOB's state to "chase".
MOB is always at full speed in "chase" state.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
If MOB's "Can Run" value is 1, set the animation to run. Otherwise, set it to walk, since MOB will always be moving in "chase" state.
Always be trying to find Target.
If within range, attack.
When Target is out of range or "dead", reset MOB's state to "idle".
When we go back to idle, clear the target.
At semi-random intervals MOB wanders around in search of Targets.
If another MOB is within range, and Faction Alliance = -1, set MOB's target and MOB's state to "chase".
MOB is always at full speed in "chase" state.
If an enemy gets too close, run away!
Always be trying to find Target.
If the MOB is moving we set the direction to the movement angle.
If MOB's "Can Run" value is 1, set the animation to run. Otherwise, set it to walk.
Otherwise the MOB just stands idle.
When ranged combatants search for targets, they do so by lining themselves up with the closest coordinate. After lining up within 8 pixels of the coordinate they face their target and attack.
When Target is out of range or "dead", reset MOB's state to "idle".
MOB is always at full speed in "retreat" state.
If the MOB is moving we set the direction to the movement angle.
If MOB's "Can Run" value is 1, set the animation to run. Otherwise, set it to walk.
Otherwise the MOB just stands idle.
Enable status effect visuals and cycle through them.
Effect Check
Empower (Red)
Shield (Cyan)
Unconscious (None)
Poison (Yellow Green)
Slow (Gray)
Paralysis (Yellow)
Confusion (none)
Shock (Yellow)
Update G_GAMEDATA Char Statuses
Try not to overlap.
Party Attack Handler
If Attack Power = 0, then don't attack.
If Attack Power > 0, then allow the attack.
Ammo Check. If out, set state to "Reload".
Attack Animation Speed = Base Attack Speed * Weapon Speed Level
Attack Type = 0, Ranged
If using Special Ammo, subtract round from Inventory.
If Ammo has run dry, then remove completely.
Spawn the proper muzzle flash.
Attack Type = 1, Melee
If still pressing "Attack" key at the correct frame, repeat attack before holstering weapon.
MOB Attack Handler
Attack Type = 0, Ranged
Sound FX is not "NULL"
Attack Type = 1, Melee
Sound FX is not "NULL"
FIRE: Flamethrower
WATER: Wave
STATIC: Bolt
ICE: Freeze Ray
EARTH: Overgrowth
WIND: Tornado
VENOM: Poison Gas
Loot Handler
Check MOB Loot Drop Chance. If successful, create item at MOB.
Flash and destroy corpse
If KO'd, make sure not to go to pain animation. Instead, go to KOpain.
If Shielded, halve damage.
Party Member damage calculations.
MOB damage calculations.
If MOB has Elemental resistance, halve damage.
If MOB has Elemental immunity, negate damage.
If MOB has Elemental absorption, heal damage.
If MOB has Elemental weakness, double damage.
Deal Damage
Loot Handler
If the attack kills the MOB, check to see if a Party Member killed it. If so, add money.
01 : Bandage
If target party member's HP is <= 0, don't allow heal.
Else, heal target party member +5 HP.
If target is different from user, direction towards target.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
02 : Stitch Kit
If target party member's HP is <= 0, don't allow heal.
Else, heal target party member +10 HP.
If target is different from user, direction towards target.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
03 : Medbag
If target party member's HP is <= 0, don't allow heal.
Else, heal target party member +100% HP.
If target is different from user, direction towards target.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
04 : First Aid Kit
If target party member's HP is <= 0, don't allow heal.
Else, revive target party member to 20% HP.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
05 : RC Battery
06 : RC Fuse
07 : Antidote
If target is different from user, direction towards target.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
08 : Candy Bar
If target is different from user, direction towards target.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
09 : Relaxant
If target is different from user, direction towards target.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
10 : Tonic
If target is different from user, direction towards target.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
12 : A Scribbled Note (intro clue)
